camel_case.php File Reference

Converts variables in files from underscored case to lower camel case. More...

Enumerations

enum  BASE_DIR

Functions

 c ($word)
 cDir ($path)
 cFile ($filename)

Detailed Description

Converts variables in files from underscored case to lower camel case.

call cDir() with the directory of the files you wish to change.

Will only effect $undersored_words and $this->undersocred_words.
